lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Administration, under Congressional pressure to cut the trade deficit, will urge Tokyo and Bonn to meet commitments to speed economic growth to stabilise currencies at Wednesday's meetings of leading industrial nations in Washington, monetary sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Japanese Finance Minister Kiichi Miyazawa is expected to bring the outline of an economic stimulus package to the meeting, which will be attended by West Germany, France, Britain, Italy and Canada as well as the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sharp deviations from the set objectives would trigger consultations among the countries on appropriate corrective action, they added.
